content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_button
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 21, "index": 29}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 39, "index": 37}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 63, "index": 39}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 39, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a jungle_button I need to craft jungle_planks first. Jungle_planks can be crafted from jungle_log, which is available in slot 13. Therefore, I will move the jungle_log into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_button
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 21, "index": 29}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 39, "index": 37}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 63, "index": 39}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 39, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft the jungle_planks by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_button
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 21, "index": 29}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 39, "index": 37}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 63, "index": 39}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 39, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a jungle_button I need to place a jungle_planks in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the jungle_planks from slot 11 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_button
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 21, "index": 29}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 39, "index": 37}, {"type": "crimson_stem", "quantity": 63, "index": 39}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 39, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft the jungle_button by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
